title: SSN details
extract: There are two Internet verification options you can use to verify that your employee names and Social Security numbers (SSN) match Social Security's records. You can: Verify up to 10 names and SSNs (per screen) online and receive immediate results.
extract_html: There are two Internet verification options you can use to verify that your employee names and Social Security numbers (SSN) match Social Security's records. You can: Verify up to 10 names and SSNs (per screen) online and receive immediate results.
